description.narrative: The proposed “Project for Developing Sustainable Agricultural Economy” (PDSAE) project builds on the successes of the first SEEDS project and aims to further strengthen local productivity of agricultural produce in the Maldives.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative:
1.1 No. of trained auditors for farm inspection: Work preparation. No. of chemical-residue testing samples collected, analysed and reported No. of random inspection trips after certification
1.2 No. of lab facilities established - Preparatory work.
1.3 No. of trainings/trainees trained on agricultural techniques - Preparatory work
1.4 Establishment and operation a training facility in Laamu Atoll - Prerequisites and preparatory work
1.5 No. of systems installed and no. of individuals trained - Training preparatory work.
2.1 No. of young/new generation of agro-entrepreneurs incubated - Facility preparatory work and selection process finalization, commencement of construction of the facility.
3.1 No. of pop-up stalls fabricated/Number of agro-entrepreneurs enabled to sell produce within the market - Preparatory work and initiation of procurements.
3.2 Number of enrolments in the incubation programme - all preparatory work to be completed. Number of prolonged subscribers to the incubation programme Number of F&B and food production entrepreneurs engaged with Authentic Maldives Number of F&B and food production entrepreneurs engaged with the food court
3.3 Successful development of the required CMS system base and industry specific modules - ToR development and initiation of bidding process. Publication of SME handbook and displayed in the appropriate avenues - 1 SME hand book finalized. Number of new advertisements/assets/posts/ templates developed - ToR development and consultancy firm hire for developing 20 promotional/marketing materials.
3.4 Number of agricultural boats in operation enabling an effective, timely transportation mechanism for food produce - develop and finalize ToR and initiate consultancy work to finalize drawings boat with solar PV cold storage.

comment.narrative:
Project document finalizing and signing between UNDP, GoJ and government Minsitries, Ministry of Economic Development (MED) and the Ministry of Fisheries, Marine Resources and Agriculture (MoFMRA).
Project implementation not initiated in 2021.
Project Document signed. Project implementation not initiated in 2021.

1.1 No. of trained auditors for farm inspection: Target 250 auditors. Work preparation in 2022. No. of chemical-residue testing samples collected, analyzed and reported No. of random inspection trips after certification
1.2 No. of lab facilities established - Target: 1 lab. Preparatory work in 2022.
1.3 No. of trainings/trainees trained on agricultural techniques - Target: 3 trainings and 15 participants - Preparatory work in 2022.
1.4 Establishment and operation a training facility in Laamu Atoll - Target: 1 facility - Prerequisites and preparatory work in 2022.
1.5 No. of systems installed and no. of individuals trained - Target: 30 farming systems (10 drip irrigation systems, 5 organic farming setups and 15 training individuals - Training preparatory work in 2022.
2.1 No. of young/new generation of agro-entrepreneurs incubated - Target: 12 farming lots and 36 new farmers - Facility preparatory work and selection process finalization, commencement of construction of the facility in 2022.
3.1 No. of pop-up stalls fabricated/Number of agro-entrepreneurs enabled to sell produce within the market. Target - 28 popup stalls and 2 interactive digital screens - Preparatory work and initiation of procurement in 2022.
3.2 Number of enrolments in the incubation programme - 3 Authentic Maldives food stalls, 50 producers engaged through the food court. - All preparatory work to be completed in 2022. Number of prolonged subscribers to the incubation programme Number of F&B and food production entrepreneurs engaged with Authentic Maldives Number of F&B and food production entrepreneurs engaged with the food court
3.3 Successful development of the required CMS system base and industry specific modules - Target: 1CMS, 200 subscriber clients engaged through CMS - ToR development and initiation of bidding process in 2022.
Publication of SME handbook and displayed in the appropriate avenues - 1 SME hand book finalized. Number of new advertisements/assets/posts/ templates developed - ToR development and consultancy firm hire for developing 20 promotional/marketing materials.
3.4 Number of agricultural boats in operation enabling an effective, timely transportation mechanism for food produce. Target: 1 boat. - Develop and finalize ToR and initiate consultancy work to finalize drawings boat with solar PV cold storage in 2022.
